1323680.name: War Girl Demo
1323680.description:
Please enjoy this small taste of what's to come in this free demo of War Girl!

War Girl is a platformer/shooter with a focus on customizing your abilities! Unlock items, upgrades and various other stat boosters to equip yourself for your fight against the robots!

The Story

In a distant future, the robots of the world have already taken up arms against their human creators and won! A wandering soldier known to the robots as the Antagonist is humanity's last hope to put a stop to the iron grip the robots' Supreme Overlord has on the people of the planet. In her journey to find someone very important to her, she tears through every metal menace they put in her way!
1323680.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
